verses.verse: In the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8147>month<s%>, in the twelfth day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against <S%H4714>him<s%>, and against all Egypt;

speak <S%H1696><s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H6547>Behold<s%>, I am against thee, Pharaoh <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8577>monster<s%> that <S%H7257>lieth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, that hath <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H2975>river<s%> is mine <S%H6213>own<s%>, and I have made it for myself.

And I will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2397>hooks<s%> in thy <S%H3895>jaws<s%>, and I will cause the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%> to <S%H1692>stick<s%> unto thy <S%H7193>scales<s%>; and I will bring thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%>, with all the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%> which <S%H1692>stick<s%> unto thy <S%H7193>scales<s%>.

And I will <S%H5203>cast<s%> thee forth into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, thee and all the <S%H1710>fish<s%> of thy <S%H2975>rivers<s%>: thou shalt <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%>; thou shalt not be brought <S%H622>together<s%>, nor <S%H6908>gathered<s%>; I have <S%H5414>given<s%> thee for <S%H402>food<s%> to the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and to the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>.

And all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because they have been a <S%H4938>staff<s%> of <S%H7070>reed<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

When they took <S%H8610>hold<s%> of thee by thy <S%H3709>hand<s%>, thou didst <S%H7533>break<s%>, and didst <S%H1234>rend<s%> all their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>; and when they <S%H8172>leaned<s%> upon <S%H7665>thee<s%>, thou brakest, and madest all their <S%H4975>loins<s%> to be at a <S%H5976>stand<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring a <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon <S%H3772>thee<s%>, and will cut off from thee <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast<s%>.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> and a <S%H2723>waste<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. Because he hath <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H2975>river<s%> is <S%H6213>mine<s%>, and I have made it;

therefore <S%H2975><s%>, behold, I am against thee, and against thy rivers, and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> an <S%H2721>utter<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%> and <S%H8077>desolation<s%>, from the <S%H4024>tower<s%> of <S%H5482>Seveneh<s%> even unto the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%>.

No <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H7272>it<s%>, nor foot of <S%H929>beast<s%> shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H3427>it<s%>, neither shall it be inhabited <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>countries<s%> that are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>; and her <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> that are laid <S%H2717>waste<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>; and I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and will <S%H2219>disperse<s%> them through the <S%H776>countries<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>: At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> from the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> whither they were <S%H6327>scattered<s%>;

and I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and will cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6624>Pathros<s%>, into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H4351>birth<s%>; and they shall be there a <S%H8217>base<s%> <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>.

It shall be the <S%H8217>basest<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%>; neither shall it any more lift itself up <S%H5375>above<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and I will <S%H4591>diminish<s%> <S%H7287>them<s%>, that they shall no more rule over the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

And it shall be no more the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H2142>bringing<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>, when they turn to <S%H6437>look<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3045>them<s%>: and they shall know that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

And it came to pass in the <S%H7651>seven<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H259>month<s%>, in the first day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H5647>caused<s%> his <S%H2428>army<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5656>service<s%> against <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>: every <S%H7218>head<s%> was made <S%H7139>bald<s%>, and every <S%H3802>shoulder<s%> was <S%H4803>worn<s%>; yet had he no <S%H7939>wages<s%>, nor his <S%H2428>army<s%>, from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%>, for the <S%H5656>service<s%> that he had served against <S%H5647>it<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I will give the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H5019>Nebuchadrezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>; and he shall <S%H5375>carry<s%> off her <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, and <S%H5375>take<s%> her <S%H7998>spoil<s%>, and <S%H7997>take<s%> her <S%H957>prey<s%>; and it shall be the <S%H7939>wages<s%> for his <S%H2428>army<s%>.

I have <S%H5414>given<s%> him the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as his <S%H6468>recompense<s%> for which he <S%H5647>served<s%>, because they <S%H6213>wrought<s%> for <S%H5002>me<s%>, saith the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Jehovah<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H6779>cause<s%> a <S%H7161>horn<s%> to bud <S%H6779>forth<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee the <S%H6610>opening<s%> of the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3045>them<s%>; and they shall know that I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
